
{{alias}}( fcn[, arity, ][thisArg] )
    Transforms a curried function into a function invoked with multiple arguments.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fcn: Function
        Curried function.

    arity: integer (optional)
        Number of parameters.

    thisArg: any (optional)
        Evaluation context.

    Returns
    -------
    uncurried: Function
        Uncurried function.

    Examples
    --------
    > function addX( x ) {
    >     return function addY( y ) {
    >         return x + y;
    >     };
    > }
    > var add = {{alias}}( addX );
    > var sum = add( 3, 2 )
    5

    // To enforce a fixed number of parameters, provide an `arity` argument:
    > function add( y ) {
    >     return function add( x ) {
    >         return x + y;
    >     }
    > }
    > var fcn = {{alias}}( add, 2 );
    > var sum = fcn( 9 )
    <Error>

    // To specify an execution context, provide a `thisArg` argument:
    > function addY( y ) {
    >     this.y = y;
    >     return addX;
    > }
    > function addX( x ) {
    >     return x + this.y;
    > }
    > var fcn = {{alias}}( addY, {} );
    > var sum = fcn( 3, 2 )
    5
